definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="28" y="60"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:reagent_input</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:relic_loot</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot cthulhufishing:blocks/relic_reagent</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
